name: views.open
desc: Open a view for a user.

interactivity_pointer.desc: Exchange an interactivity pointer to post to the user.

trigger_id.desc: Exchange a trigger to post to the user.

view.desc: A [view payload](/reference/views). This must be a JSON-encoded string.

errors.duplicate_external_id: Error returned when the given `external_id` has already be used.
errors.exchanged_trigger_id: The trigger_id was already exchanged in a previous call.
errors.invalid_trigger_id: The trigger_id is invalid. The expected format for the trigger_id argument is "132456.7890123.abcdef".
errors.view_too_large: Error returned if the provided view is greater than 250kb.
